body_html: Same issue here, a ctx synchronize always blocks the H2D memory copy before the complete of GPU computing. @sh1ng I saw a lot of space between two H2D in your profiling results, maybe you should reduce the cpu processing time (e.g. data preprocssing) first, which worked for me
